Function Documentation

void @47::shuffleDateForLocale ( int &  item1,
int &  item2,
int &  item3 
) [static]

Swaps date items depending on the locale date format.

NOTE: The input is allways day, month, year.

Parameters:
item1 receives the day as input, and returns the date element to be put first if formating to a string.
item2 receives the month as input, and returns the date element to be put second if formating to a string.
item2 receives the year as input, and returns the date element to be put last if formating to a string.
